PerformanceElementTiming.summary: NOTE Experimental The PerformanceElementTiming interface contains render timing information for image and text node elements the developer annotated with an elementtiming attribute for observation.

PerformanceElementTimingElement.summary: NOTE Experimental The element read-only property of the interface returns an which is a pointer to the observed element.
PerformanceElementTimingElement.value: An , or null if the element is a shadow DOM element.

PerformanceElementTimingId.summary: NOTE Experimental The id read-only property of the interface returns the id of the associated element.

PerformanceElementTimingIdentifier.summary: NOTE Experimental The identifier read-only property of the interface returns the value of the elementtiming attribute on the element.

PerformanceElementTimingIntersectionRect.summary: NOTE Experimental The intersectionRect read-only property of the interface returns the rectangle of the element within the viewport.
PerformanceElementTimingIntersectionRect.value: A which is the rectangle of the element within the viewport.For display images this is the display rectangle of the image within the viewport. For text this is the display rectangle of the node in the viewport. This being the smallest rectangle that contains the union of all text nodes that belong to the element.

PerformanceElementTimingLoadTime.summary: NOTE Experimental The loadTime read-only property of the interface always returns 0 for text. For images it returns the time which is the latest between the time the image resource is loaded and the time it is attached to the element.
PerformanceElementTimingLoadTime.value: A with the loadTime of the element. Always 0 for text.

PerformanceElementTimingNaturalHeight.summary: NOTE Experimental The naturalHeight read-only property of the interface returns the intrinsic height of the image element.
PerformanceElementTimingNaturalHeight.value: An unsigned 32-bit integer (unsigned long) which is the intrinsic height of the image if this is applied to an image, 0 for text.

PerformanceElementTimingNaturalWidth.summary: NOTE Experimental The naturalWidth read-only property of the interface returns the intrinsic width of the image element.
PerformanceElementTimingNaturalWidth.value: An unsigned 32-bit integer (unsigned long) which is the intrinsic width of the image if this is applied to an image, 0 for text.

PerformanceElementTimingRenderTime.summary: NOTE Experimental The renderTime read-only property of the interface returns the render time of the associated element.
PerformanceElementTimingRenderTime.value: A with the render time of the element.For images this will be the image rendering timestamp. This is defined as the next paint that occurs after the image becomes fully loaded. If the timing allow check fails (as defined by the Timing-allow-origin header) this will return 0.For text nodes this will be the text rendering timestamp. This is defined as when the element becomes text painted.

PerformanceElementTimingToJSON.summary: NOTE Experimental The toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the object.
PerformanceElementTimingToJSON.returns: A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.The JSON doesn't contain the property because it is of type , which doesn't provide a toJSON() operation. The of the element is provided, though.

PerformanceElementTimingUrl.summary: NOTE Experimental The url read-only property of the interface returns the initial URL of the resource request when the element is an image.
PerformanceElementTimingUrl.value: A string which is the initial URL of the resources request for images or 0 for text.
